mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECOMMENDATION_MEAL_ITEM ( RECOMMENDATION_MEAL_ITEM_ID, RECOMMENDATION_ID, DAYNUMBER, DIVISION, NAME, CARBOHYDRATE, PROTEIN, FAT, SODIUM, CALORIE ) VALUES ( #{recommendationMealItemId}, #{recommendationId}, #{dayNumber}, #{division}, #{name}, #{carbohydrate}, #{protein}, #{fat}, #{sodium}, #{calorie} )
